---
 title: "Pregunta 3 del capítulo 8."
---

Let $X_1,\dots, X_n \sim t_3$ where $n = 25$. Let $\theta = T(F) = (q_{.75} − q_{.25})/1.34$ where $q_p$ denotes the $p$ th quantile. Do a simulation to compare the coverage and length of the following conﬁdence intervals for $\theta$:

(i) Normal interval with standard error from the bootstrap.

(ii) bootstrap percentile interval.


(iii) pivotal bootstrap interval.
